extendedIngredients.name: cream
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ cup low-fat sour cream or Tofutti Better Than Sour Cream

extendedIngredients.name: mango
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 small mango, peeled and chopped (1 cup)

extendedIngredients.name: strawberries
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 lb. strawberries, hulled and halved (5 cups)

extendedIngredients.name: yellow bell pepper
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ cup chopped red or yellow bell pepper

recipes.title: Strawberry Gazpacho with Lime Cilantro Cream

winePairing.pairingText: Gazpacho works really well with Albarino, Manzanilla Sherry, and Verdejo. Though gazpacho is said to be a tricky pairing, all these Spanish wines can work. The La Canan Albarino with a 4.1 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 20 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: La Cana Albarino
productMatches.description: Pineapple, lemon, seashell and salt scents carry through on the pure, silky palate. Finishes very long with brilliant acidity, rich citrus fruit flavors, fine minerals and just the slightest touch of almond. Absolutely delicious.

recipes.instructions: 1. Pulse strawberries, mango, bell pepper, shallot, oil, 2 Tbs. cilantro, 2 Tbs. lime juice, and 3 tsp. agave in food processor until puréed with some texture remaining. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.2. Stir together sour cream, remaining 2 Tbs. cilantro, remaining 2 Tbs. lime juice, and remaining 1 tsp. agave in bowl. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.3. Ladle gazpacho into bowls, and dollop each serving with 2 Tbs. Lime Cilantro Cream.

steps.step: Pulse strawberries, mango, bell pepper, shallot, oil, 2 Tbs. cilantro, 2 Tbs. lime juice, and 3 tsp. agave in food processor until puréed with some texture remaining. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.2. Stir together sour cream, remaining 2 Tbs. cilantro, remaining 2 Tbs. lime juice, and remaining 1 tsp. agave in bowl. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.3. Ladle gazpacho into bowls, and dollop each serving with 2 Tbs. Lime Cilantro Cream.
